# Help (ARCHIVED)

**Status:** DEPRECATED - Merged into `/hub`
**Migration:** Use `/hub` or `/hub [topic]` instead

---

This command has been archived as part of Phase 3 optimization.
The functionality is now part of the `/hub` command which provides:
- Command overview and navigation
- Topic-specific help with `/hub [topic]`
- Quick reference for all hubs

## Migration Guide

| Old Command | New Command |
|-------------|-------------|
| `/help` | `/hub` |
| `/help workflow` | `/hub workflow` |
| `/help git` | `/hub git` |
